name: FPS Microgame (FreeZucchini)
description:
This project was built of Unity's template called the FPS Microgame. Most of the gameplay already came with the template but the level, new effects and some mechanics are new.

Download and extract the ZIP file then inside the folder click on the file that says 'FPS Microgame' not 'FPS Microgame_Data'.

The destructible wall may take a couple tries to break and it's better when shot from afar.
